revision.text:
[[File:Alexandra Fjodorowna and Nicholas II of Russia in Russian dress.3.jpg|thumb|180px|[[Nicholas II of Russia|Tsar Nicholas II]] and [[Alexandra Feodorovna (Alix of Hesse)|Tsaritsa Alexandra]] posed in 17th-century Russian court dress.]] The '''1903 ball in the Winter Palace''' ({{lang-ru|Костюмированный бал 1903 года}}) was a luxurious [[Ball (dance party)|ball]] during the reign of the emperor [[Nicholas II of Russia]]. It was held in the [[Winter Palace]], [[Saint Petersburg]], in two stages, on February 11 and 13. All the visitors were in bejeweled [[History of Russia|17th-century]] style costumes, made from designs by the artist [[Sergey Solomko]], in collaboration with historical experts.
Grand Duke [[Grand Duke Alexander Mikhailovich of Russia|Alexander Mikhailovitch]] recalled the occasion as "the last spectacular ball in the history of the empire ... [but] a new and hostile Russia glared through the large windows of the palace ... while we danced, the workers were striking and the clouds in the Far East were hanging dangerously low."<ref>Andrei Maylunas, Segei Mironenko (1996). A Lifelong Passion. London: Orian Publishing Group Ltd. {{ISBN|0-297-81520-2}}., p. 226</ref>
The entire [[House of Romanov|Imperial family]] posed in rich 17th-century costumes, [[Nicholas II of Russia|Tsar Nicholas]] as [[Alexei I]], the [[Alexandra Feodorovna (Alix of Hesse)|Tsaritsa]] as [[Maria Miloslavskaya]], in the [[Hermitage Theatre]], many wearing priceless original items brought specially from the [[Kremlin]],<ref>Maylunas, p. 227</ref> for what was to be their final photograph together.<ref>Kurth, Peter (1995). Tsar: The Lost World of Nicholas and Alexandra. London: Little, Brown and Company (UK) Ltd. {{ISBN|0-316-50787-3}}., p. 64</ref>

{{flagicon|Russia}} 120+ [[Naval Infantry (Russia)|Naval Infantry]] advisors, several BMPs{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/russian-army-convoy-arrives-aleppo/|title=Russian Army convoy arrives in Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=30 August 2016|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|accessdate=30 August 2016}} |strength2=8,000–10,000+ fighters{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/islamist-group-mourns-fallen-rebel-fighters-southern-aleppo-offensive/|title=Islamist group mourns fallen rebel fighters during southern Aleppo offensive|first=Chris|last=Tomson|date=2 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=3 August 2016}} * {{flagicon image|Flag of Jabhat Fatah al-Sham.svg}} 2,500+ Jabhat Fateh fighters * {{flagicon image|Flag of the Turkistan Islamic Party in Syria.svg}} 500 TIP fighters and 60 suicide attackers |casualties1=688 killed (per The Inside Source; since 31 July){{cite web|url=http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!Complete-Aleppo-Battle-Report/cjds/57b15db60cf23f8fc3b69d06|title=The Inside Source|publisher=|accessdate=26 August 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160830231409/http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!Complete-Aleppo-Battle-Report/cjds/57b15db60cf23f8fc3b69d06|archive-date=30 August 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}}{{cite web|url=http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!BREAKING-Artillery-Base-in-South-Aleppo-under-SAA-Control/cjds/57c9479dda6989244660cdd2|title=BREAKING - Artillery Base in South Aleppo under SAA Control!|publisher=The Inside Source|date=4 September 2016|accessdate=4 September 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160830231409/http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!BREAKING-Artillery-Base-in-South-Aleppo-under-SAA-Control/cjds/57c9479dda6989244660cdd2|archive-date=30 August 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}}
625 killed (per SOHR; 31 July – 10 Sep.){{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/?p=50493|title=More than 11000 casualties and injuries in the battle of breaking the siege of Aleppo city|publisher=SOHR|accessdate=10 September 2016}} |casualties2=1,051 killed (per The Inside Source; since 31 July){{cite web|url=http://www.insidesourcenews.com/single-post/2016/09/12/Waves-of-Airstrikes-Light-Up-Southern-Aleppo|title=The Inside Source|publisher=|accessdate=22 September 2016}}
948 killed (per SOHR; 31 July – 10 Sep.) |casualties3=718 civilians killed (31 July – 10 Sep.) | campaignbox = {{Campaignbox Syrian Civil War}}{{Campaignbox Battle of Aleppo}} }} The '''2016 Aleppo summer campaign'''{{cite web|url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-mideast-crisis-syria-aleppo-idUSKCN11B1QL|title=Syrian army presses Aleppo campaign as rebels retrench|date=6 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=9 September 2016|via=Reuters}} started with a military operation launched on the northern outskirts of [[Aleppo]] in late June 2016, by the [[Syrian Army|Syrian Arab Army]]. The aim of the offensive was to cut the last rebel supply line into Aleppo city.{{cite web|url=http://news.xinhuanet.com/english/2016-06/26/c_135467722.htm|title=Syrian army unleashes broad offensive in Aleppo|publisher=|accessdate=2 July 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.morningstaronline.co.uk/a-4241-Syria-Army-bid-to-cut-off-Aleppo-unleashes-fierce-fighting#.V3WUhut96Uk|title=Syria: Army bid to cut off Aleppo unleashes fierce fighting|publisher=|accessdate=2 July 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160630013917/http://www.morningstaronline.co.uk/a-4241-Syria-Army-bid-to-cut-off-Aleppo-unleashes-fierce-fighting#.V3WUhut96Uk|archive-date=30 June 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} By late July, the military had managed to sever the last rebel supply line coming from the north and completely surround Aleppo. However, within days, the rebels launched a large-scale counter-attack south of Aleppo in an attempt to both open a new supply line into rebel-held parts of the city and cut-off the government-held side. The whole campaign, including both the Army's offensive and subsequent rebel counter-offensive, was seen by both sides as possibly deciding the fate of the entire war.{{cite web|url=http://www.conflict-news.com/articles/battle-for-aleppo-a-rebel-breakthrough-or-bust|title=Battle for Aleppo: A Rebel Breakthrough or Bust|publisher=|accessdate=2 August 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160816083259/http://www.conflict-news.com/articles/battle-for-aleppo-a-rebel-breakthrough-or-bust|archive-date=16 August 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}}{{cite web|url=http://www.aljazeera.com/news/2016/08/syria-war-rebels-vow-intensify-offensive-aleppo-160802152801024.html|title=Syria war: Rebels vow to intensify offensive in Aleppo|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=https://www.dailystar.com.lb/ArticlePrint.aspx?id=365332&mode=print|title=Syrian govt forces roll back rebel gains in Aleppo: activists|newspaper=Daily Star}}{{cite web|url=http://www.rferl.mobi/a/islamic-state-syria-aleppo-siege-change-war/27900375.html|title=Analysis: Why The Battle For Aleppo Could Change The Direction Of The War In Syria|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://carnegieendowment.org/2016/07/29/what-rebel-loss-of-aleppo-will-mean-for-syria-pub-64225|title=What the Rebel Loss of Aleppo Will Mean for Syria|first=Aron|last=Lund|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}} The battle was also notable for the large loss of top rebel field commanders, with about three dozen being killed.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-armed-forces-carry-special-operation-avenge-beheaded-boy-northern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Armed Forces carry out special operation to avenge the beheaded boy in northern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=29 July 2016|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|accessdate=29 July 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/jihadist-commanders-killed-aleppo-clashes/|title=More jihadist commanders killed in Aleppo clashes|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=28 August 2016|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|accessdate=29 August 2016}}{{cite web|title=Syrian Army, Hezbollah capture several points in southern Aleppo|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-hezbollah-capture-several-points-southern-aleppo/|website=Al-Masdar|accessdate=18 August 2016}} By early September, Syrian government troops had cemented their siege of the rebel part of the city. ==The campaign== ===Army advances, rebel-held Aleppo surrounded=== {{main article|Aleppo offensive (June–July 2016)}} The offensive began on 25 June, with heavy Russian air-strikes{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/heavy-russian-airstrikes-aleppo/|title=Heavy Russian airstrikes on Aleppo amid preparations for huge ground offensive|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=25 June 2016|publisher=|accessdate=2 July 2016}} and ground bombardment. On 26 June, the military made advances into the Mallah Farms,{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/field-report-syrian-army-advances-northern-aleppo-amid-intensifying-battles/|title=Field Report: Syrian Army advances in northern Aleppo amid intensifying battles|first=Zen|last=Adra|date=26 June 2016|publisher=|accessdate=2 July 2016}} and by 28 June, they had captured half of the farmlands,{{cite web|url=http://www.heart.co.uk/news/uk-world/syrian-government-forces-close-in-on-aleppo/#2FQX2A4IH9zqzwh3.97|title=Syrian Government Forces Close In On Aleppo|publisher=|accessdate=2 July 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160629160241/http://www.heart.co.uk/news/uk-world/syrian-government-forces-close-in-on-aleppo/#2FQX2A4IH9zqzwh3.97|archive-date=29 June 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} including the Al-Asamat and Arab Salum areas.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/aleppo-battle-update-syrian-army-fully-recaptures-eastern-parts-mallah-map/|title=Aleppo Battle Update: Syrian Army fully recaptures eastern parts of Mallah + [Map]|first=Zen|last=Adra|date=26 June 2016|publisher=|accessdate=2 July 2016}} The advances brought the Castello Road within firing range of the military's artillery.{{cite web|url=https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/middle_east/syrian-troops-capture-important-area-near-the-city-of-aleppo/2016/06/28/1109d1fa-3d26-11e6-9e16-4cf01a41decb_story.html|title=US-backed Syrian rebels move toward IS-held town near Iraq|publisher=|accessdate=2 July 2016}} After midnight on 7 July, amid heavy airstrikes, pro-government forces captured the southern part of Mallah and came within one kilometer of the Castello Road.{{cite web|url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-mideast-crisis-syria-aleppo-idUSKCN0ZN0U2|title=Syrian army fire cuts only road into rebel-held Aleppo: rebels|work=Reuters|date=7 July 2016}} They captured a mosque complex and a hill which overlook the Castello Road,{{cite web|url=https://www.straitstimes.com/world/middle-east/fierce-fighting-for-key-aleppo-road-despite-syria-truce|title=Fierce fighting for key Aleppo road despite Syria truce|newspaper=The Straits Times|accessdate=9 July 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.bbc.com/news/world-middle-east-36735196|title=Syria conflict: Army fire 'cuts key Aleppo road' - BBC News|publisher=|accessdate=9 July 2016}} thus enabling them to bring the road under artillery fire-control.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-aleppo-rebels-trapped-as-syrian-army-cuts-off-main-supply-route/|title=Aleppo rebels trapped as Syrian Army cuts off main supply route. Map Update|first=Zen|last=Adra|date=7 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=9 July 2016}} This effectively cut off the only supply route to the rebel-held part of Aleppo. Several days later, the Army advanced in the al-Layramoun{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-continues-advance-aleppo-neighborhoods/|title=Syrian Army continues advance in Aleppo neighborhoods|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=9 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=12 July 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/38-%D8%B4%D9%87%D9%8A%D8%AF%D8%A7%D9%8B-%D9%85%D8%B9%D8%B8%D9%85%D9%87%D9%85-%D9%85%D9%86-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%A3%D8%B7%D9%81%D8%A7%D9%84-%D9%88%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%85%D9%88%D8%A7%D8%B7%D9%86%D8%A7%D8%AA-%D9%81/|title=38 شهيداً معظمهم من الأطفال والمواطنات في القذائف على مدينة حلب وتقدم للنظام في الليرمون وشهداء وجرحى في قصف جوي على المدينة|publisher=|accessdate=12 July 2016}} al-Khalidiyah{{cite web|url=http://www.qasioun.net/en/news/show/31138/Syrian_Regime_Progressing_In_Khaldya_Front_%E2%80%A6_Russians_Shelling_Aleppo%E2%80%99s_Neighborhood|title=Syrian Regime Progressing In Khaldya Front … Russians Shelling Aleppo’s Neighborhood - Qasion News Agency|publisher=|accessdate=12 July 2016}} and Bani Zeid districts.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/russian-airstrikes-propel-syrian-army-inside-aleppo-city/|title=Russian airstrikes propel the Syrian Army inside Aleppo City|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=10 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=12 July 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/2016/07/13/%d8%a7%d8%b4%d8%aa%d8%a8%d8%a7%d9%83%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%b9%d9%86%d9%8a%d9%81%d8%a9-%d9%81%d9%8a-%d8%a3%d8%b7%d8%b1%d8%a7%d9%81-%d9%85%d8%af%d9%8a%d9%86%d8%a9-%d8%ad%d9%84%d8%a8-%d9%88%d8%b4%d9%85%d8%a7/|title=اشتباكات عنيفة في أطراف مدينة حلب وشمالها وقصف جوي يستهدف المدينة وريفيها الشمالي والغربي|first=|last=user3|publisher=|accessdate=21 July 2016}} During this time, government troops captured the Sadkop Gas Factory.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-advances-inside-key-aleppo-district/|title=Syrian Army advances inside key Aleppo district|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=11 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=12 July 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.yahoo.com/news/syria-army-presses-aleppo-offensive-despite-truce-extension-112656403.html|title=Syria army presses Aleppo offensive despite truce extension|publisher=|accessdate=15 July 2016}} By the evening of 13 July, the military secured the whole al-Khalidiyah district and most of the al-Layramoun industrial area, after capturing the last several rebel-held buildings in al-Khalidiyah, as well as al-Layramoun’s gas factory, market and glass factory.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breakthrough-aleppo-syrian-army-captures-khalidiyeh-district-map-update/|title=Breakthrough in Aleppo as the Syrian Army captures Khalidiyeh district - Map update|first=Chris|last=Tomson|date=13 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=15 July 2016}} On 17 July, the Army and Hezbollah reached the Castello Road, capturing parts of it and completely cutting it after taking control of Castello Hill. With this advance, the rebel-held part of Aleppo city was fully besieged{{cite web|url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-mideast-crisis-syria-aleppo-idUSKCN0ZX09Q|title=Syrian army seizes only road into rebel-held Aleppo|date=17 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=21 July 2016|via=Reuters}}{{cite web|url=https://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2016/07/17/world/middleeast/ap-ml-syria.html|title=Syrian Troops Besiege Rebel-Held Parts of Aleppo|date=17 July 2016|work=AP|accessdate=21 July 2016|via=The New York Times}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/tiger-forces-advance-north-aleppo/|title=Tiger Forces advance in North Aleppo - Map update|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=17 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=21 July 2016}} and the al-Layramoun roundabout came under artillery fire-control.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/syria24media/posts/1074327982602983|title=Syria 24 Media - Timeline - Facebook|publisher=|accessdate=21 July 2016}} Meanwhile, the military made more advances in the Bani Zeid and al-Layramoun areas, capturing most of the factories.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/2016/07/17/%d8%a7%d8%b4%d8%aa%d8%a8%d8%a7%d9%83%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%b9%d9%86%d9%8a%d9%81%d8%a9-%d9%88%d9%85%d8%aa%d9%88%d8%a7%d8%b5%d9%84%d8%a9-%d8%a8%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%aa%d8%b2%d8%a7%d9%85%d9%86-%d9%85%d8%b9-%d9%82/|title=اشتباكات عنيفة ومتواصلة بالتزامن مع قصف مكثف في منطقة معامل الليرمون وفي جبهتي الكاستيلو وبني زيد|first=|last=user6|publisher=|accessdate=21 July 2016}} Between 23 and 25 July, the Army expanded its control in the al-Layramoun industrial area by capturing the Textile Factory{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-advances-inside-jihadist-controlled-aleppo-city/|title=Syrian Army advances inside jihadist controlled Aleppo City|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=23 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=28 July 2016}} a dozen industrial buildings and two malls.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-advances-northwest-aleppo-jihadist-defenses-crumble/|title=Syrian Army advances in northwest Aleppo as jihadist defenses crumble|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=25 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=25 July 2016}} Late on 25 July, the Tiger Forces captured two sites in and near the Castillo Complex, threatening to cut off the rebels remaining at Bani Zeid and al-Layramoun.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/tiger-forces-continue-advance-north-aleppo-capture-points-imperative-highway/|title=Tiger Forces continue to advance in north Aleppo, capture points on imperative highway|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=25 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=25 July 2016}} On 26 July, government forces captured all of the al-Layramoun District after heavy fighting for the last rebel stronghold there, the Bus Station. After also seizing the Al-Castillo Amusement Park and imposing fire control over Bani Zeid, the remaining rebel forces in Aleppo City were left almost completely besieged.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-seizes-key-district-aleppo-city/|title=Syrian Army seizes key district in Aleppo City|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=26 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=26 July 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.jordantimes.com/news/region/syria-regime-advances-rebels-aleppo-%E2%80%94-monitor|title=Syria regime advances on rebels in Aleppo: monitor|publisher=|accessdate=28 July 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-imposes-fire-control-rebel-stronghold-aleppo-city-map/|title=Syrian Army imposes fire control over rebel stronghold in Aleppo City: map|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=26 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=26 July 2016}} On 27 July, rebel forces attacked the Kurdish-held areas of Aleppo, although their attack was repelled.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/kurdish-forces-beat-back-jihadist-rebels-aleppo-city/|title=Kurdish forces beat back jihadist rebels in Aleppo City|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=27 July 2016|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|accessdate=27 July 2016}} The Kurds then proceeded to advance into the nearby rebel-held Bani Zeid Youth Housing neighborhood{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/2016/07/27/قصف-مكثف-على-حي-الشيخ-مقصود-واشتباكات-ع/|title=قصف مكثف على حي الشيخ مقصود واشتباكات عنيفة في محور السكن الشبابي|first=|last=user4|publisher=|accessdate=28 July 2016}} and captured the whole complex.{{cite web|url=http://www.qasioun.net/en/news/show/32798/SDF_Seize_Over_The_Youth_Housing_In_Aleppo_%E2%80%A6_Russians_Commits_A_Massacre_In_Sakhour_Neighborhood|title=SDF Seize Over The Youth Housing In Aleppo … Russians Commits A Massacre In Sakhour Neighborhood - Qasion News Agency|publisher=|accessdate=28 July 2016}} Later that day, the Army officially declared it had cut off all rebel supply routes into Aleppo.{{cite web|url=http://uk.reuters.com/article/uk-mideast-crisis-syria-aleppo-idUKKCN1071FO|title=Syrian army says cut off all supply routes into east Aleppo|publisher=|accessdate=28 July 2016}} On 28 July, the military captured the Bani Zeid district,{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-captures-important-district-aleppo-city-2/|title=Syrian Army captures important district in Aleppo City|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=28 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=28 July 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-mideast-crisis-syria-aleppo-idUSKCN108167|title=Syria's powerful Nusra Front says ending link to al Qaeda|first=|last=|publisher=|accessdate=28 July 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://news.xinhuanet.com/english/2016-07/28/c_135547190.htm|title=Syrian army captures key rebel stronghold in Aleppo city - Xinhua - English.news.cn|publisher=|accessdate=28 July 2016}} as well as the rebel-held parts of the Ashrafiyah district.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-takes-control-another-district-aleppo-city/|title=Syrian Army takes control of another district in Aleppo City|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=28 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=28 July 2016}} The rebels withdrew from Bani Zeid before the main Army assault so to avoid heavy losses. The Army then continued to push its assault towards the Dahret Abdrubbah area.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/latest-field-map-aleppo-city/|title=Latest field map from Aleppo City|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=28 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=28 July 2016}} On 30 July, the Kurdish YPG captured the Shuqayyif Youth Housing area, next to the Castello Road.{{cite web|url=http://www.qasioun.net/en/news/show/33055/SDF_Seize_Over_The_Youth_Housing_And_Siege_Aleppo_With_The_Syrian_Regime|title=SDF Seize Over The Youth Housing And Siege Aleppo With The Syrian Regime - Qasion News Agency|publisher=|accessdate=1 August 2016}}[https://twitter.com/deSyracuse/status/759342493062365184] [https://twitter.com/sayed_ridha/status/759296911362752512] ===Rebel counter-offensive, both sides besieged=== {{main article|Aleppo offensive (July–August 2016)}} On 31 July, the Army of Conquest launched a counter-offensive both south and north of Aleppo in an attempt to lift the siege on the rebel-held areas of the city. Fierce fighting was reported at the Al-Castillo Highway, while the rebels managed to capture the Al-Hikma school and two hills on the southern outskirts of Aleppo, which constituted an advanced Army defense line.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/field-report-jihadi-rebels-gain-grounds-southern-aleppo-map-video/|title=Field Report: Jihadi rebels gain grounds in southern Aleppo [Map + Video]|first=Zen|last=Adra|date=31 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=1 August 2016}} The wide-scale rebel counter-attack reportedly included 8,000–10,000 fighters, 95 tanks, hundreds of rocket launchers and a large number of suicide-bombers.{{cite web|url=https://english.alarabiya.net/en/News/middle-east/2016/08/03/Syrian-army-allies-counter-attack-to-regain-lost-ground-in-Aleppo.html|title=Syrian army, allies counter-attack to regain lost ground in Aleppo|newspaper=Al Arabiya}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-rolls-back-jihadist-gains-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army rolls back jihadist gains in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=3 August 2016|publisher=}} By evening, the rebels also took control of Al-‘Amariyah village and reached the nearby 1070 Al-Hamadaniyah Housing Project where fighting continued.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/russian-air-force-emerges-southern-aleppo-help-drive-back-jihadists/|title=Russian Air Force emerges in southern Aleppo to help drive back jihadists|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=31 July 2016|publisher=|accessdate=1 August 2016}} During the night, the 1070 Al-Hamadaniyah Housing Project was also taken by the rebels.{{cite web|url=http://intelligencefusion.co.uk/2016/07/31/rebels-attempt-to-break-encirclement-of-aleppo/|title=Rebels attempt to break encirclement of Aleppo|publisher=|accessdate=1 August 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160804031418/http://intelligencefusion.co.uk/2016/07/31/rebels-attempt-to-break-encirclement-of-aleppo/|archive-date=4 August 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/jihadist-rebels-capture-key-site-aleppo-city/|title=Jihadist rebels capture key site in Aleppo City|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=1 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=1 August 2016}} The next day, the rebels once again advanced and took control of Mushrifah village (also known as Sharfa), that is situated on a hill that overlooks the Al-Assad Military Academy.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/field-report-syrian-army-loses-key-hilltop-southern-aleppo-amid-jihadist-advance-map-update/|title=Field Report: Syrian Army loses key hilltop in southern Aleppo amid jihadist advance. Map Update|first=Zen|last=Adra|date=1 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=2 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.qasioun.net/en/news/show/33268/Al_Fatih_Continue_Progressing_And_Seizes_Over_Sharfa_Village_Southern_Aleppo|title=Al-Fatih Continue Progressing And Seizes Over Sharfa Village Southern Aleppo - Qasion News Agency|publisher=|accessdate=2 August 2016}} Over the next several days, back-and-forth fighting took place for control of the 1070 Housing Project neighborhood,{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-recaptures-strategic-area-aleppo-map-update/|title=Syrian Army recaptures strategic area in Aleppo: Map Update|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=1 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=2 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/?p=49050 |title=Continued clashes in Aleppo and explosive barrels target areas of Aleppo countryside |publisher= |accessdate=2 August 2016 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20161220213850/http://www.syriahr.com/en/?p=49050 |archivedate=20 December 2016 }}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/2016/08/02/%d9%82%d8%b5%d9%81-%d8%ac%d9%88%d9%8a-%d9%8a%d8%b3%d8%aa%d9%87%d8%af%d9%81-%d8%a3%d8%ad%d9%8a%d8%a7%d8%a1-%d8%a8%d9%85%d8%af%d9%8a%d9%86%d8%a9-%d8%ad%d9%84%d8%a8-%d9%85%d8%b9-%d8%a7%d8%b3%d8%aa%d9%85/|title=قصف جوي يستهدف أحياء بمدينة حلب مع استمرار الاشتباكات في أطرافها الجنوبية الغربية|first=|last=user4|publisher=|accessdate=2 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/russian-air-force-pounds-aleppo-city-syrian-army-counters-jaysh-al-fateh/|title=Russian Air Force pounds Aleppo City while the Syrian Army counters Jaysh Al-Fateh|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=4 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}} Huwayz village,{{cite web|url=http://www.qasioun.net/en/breakingnews/view/32494/Syrian_opposition_forces_seize_over_Talet_Al_Huwaiz_village_in_the_southern_countryside_of_Aleppo|title=Syrian opposition forces seize over Talet Al-Huwaiz village in the southern countryside of Aleppo - Qasion News Agency|publisher=|accessdate=2 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/2016/08/03/%d8%b6%d8%b1%d8%a8%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%ac%d9%88%d9%8a%d8%a9-%d8%aa%d8%b3%d8%aa%d9%87%d8%af%d9%81-6-%d8%a3%d8%ad%d9%8a%d8%a7%d8%a1-%d8%a8%d9%85%d8%af%d9%8a%d9%86%d8%a9-%d8%ad%d9%84%d8%a8-%d9%8810-%d9%85/|title=ضربات جوية تستهدف 6 أحياء بمدينة حلب و10 مناطق وبلدات بريفها الغربي تخلف شهداء وجرحى ومعارك متواصلة بعنف في جنوب غرب المدينة|first=|last=user4|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.agathocledesyracuse.com/archives/813|title=Agathocle de Syracuse - Aleppo rebels counter offensive (July 31 – ongoing)|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/2016/08/03/%d8%b6%d8%b1%d8%a8%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%ac%d9%88%d9%8a%d8%a9-%d9%85%d9%83%d8%ab%d9%81%d8%a9-%d8%aa%d8%b3%d8%aa%d9%87%d8%af%d9%81-%d9%85%d8%af%d9%8a%d9%86%d8%a9-%d8%ad%d9%84%d8%a8-%d9%88%d8%a3%d8%b7%d8%b1/|title=ضربات جوية مكثفة تستهدف مدينة حلب وأطرافها الجنوبية الغربية ومزيد من الخسائر البشرية في سقوط قذائف على أحياء فيها|first=|last=user4|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}} Al-‘Amariyah and several hills.{{cite tweet|user=PetoLucem|author=Peto Lucem|number=760567562837041152|date=2 August 2016|title=Opposition map of southern #Aleppo : insurgents capture Al-#Huwayz but #SAA secures Al-#Amiriyyah and two hills.|accessdate=6 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://europe.newsweek.com/aleppo-syria-civil-war-bashar-al-assad-russia-air-strikes-gas-attacks-486710|title=Alleged chemical attacks are the latest development in Aleppo|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/jihadist-commanders-halt-aleppo-offensive-redraw-plans/|title=Jihadist commanders halt Aleppo offensive to redraw plans|first=Chris|last=Tomson|date=3 August 2016|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=http://www.qasioun.net/en/news/show/33546/Syrian_Opposition_Forces_Launch_%E2%80%9CThe_Martyr_Ibrahim_Yusuf%E2%80%9D_Battle_%E2%80%A6_And_Seize_Over_New_Positions_In_Aleppo|title=Syrian Opposition Forces Launch "The Martyr Ibrahim Yusuf" Battle … And Seize Over New Positions In Aleppo - Qasion News Agency|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/russian-airstrikes-propel-syrian-army-southern-aleppo/|title=Russian airstrikes propel the Syrian Army in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=5 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://mobile.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-reverses-rebel-gains-southwest-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army reverses rebel gains in southwest Aleppo|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=5 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/syriahroe/posts/913506015424404|title=Syrian Observatory for Human Rights - Timeline - Facebook|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/2016/08/05/%d9%85%d8%b9%d8%a7%d8%b1%d9%83-%d8%b9%d9%86%d9%8a%d9%81%d8%a9-%d9%8a%d8%b4%d9%87%d8%af%d9%87%d8%a7-%d9%85%d8%ae%d9%8a%d9%85-%d8%ad%d9%86%d8%af%d8%b1%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d9%88%d8%ac%d9%86%d9%88%d8%a8-%d8%ba/|title=معارك عنيفة يشهدها مخيم حندرات وجنوب غرب مدينة حلب ومزيد من الشهداء في أحياء بالمدينة|first=|last=user4|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/2016/08/05/%d9%87%d8%ac%d9%88%d9%85-%d8%b9%d9%86%d9%8a%d9%81-%d9%84%d9%84%d9%81%d8%b5%d8%a7%d8%a6%d9%84-%d9%81%d9%8a-%d9%85%d8%b1%d8%ad%d9%84%d8%a9-%d8%ac%d8%af%d9%8a%d8%af%d8%a9-%d9%85%d9%86-%d8%ba%d8%b2/|title=هجوم عنيف للفصائل في مرحلة جديدة من "غزوة إبراهيم اليوسف" وقصف مكثف يرافق المعارك العنيفة بجنوب مدينة حلب|first=|last=user4|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}} On 5 August, a rebel attack on the Military Academy started{{cite web|url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-mideast-crisis-syria-aleppo-idUSKCN10G22V|title=Syrian rebels storm Aleppo artillery base, army says attack repelled|date=6 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016|via=Reuters}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/jihadists-launch-massive-offensive-artillery-base-following-vbied/|title=Jihadists launch massive offensive on artillery base following VBIED|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=5 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}} and by the next day the rebels took control of more than half of the Military Academy.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/battle-aleppo-intensifies-jihadists-enter-artillery-base/|title=Battle for Aleppo intensifies as jihadists enter Artillery Base|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=6 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.qasioun.net/en/news/show/33708/Jayesh_Al_Fatih_Raids_The_Air_Forces_School_And_Clashes_With_The_Regime_Inside|title=Jayesh Al-Fatih Raids The Air Forces School And Clashes With The Regime Inside - Qasion News Agency|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}} Shortly after their advances at the Military Academy, rebels both inside and outside Aleppo advanced into the Ramouseh neighborhood, linked up and captured it. With this advance, the rebels managed to cut the government's supply line into the government-held part of west Aleppo{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/jihadists-advance-ramousah-district-cut-supply-route/|title=Jihadists advance on Ramousah district, cut supply route|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=6 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/?p=49141 |title=Factions meet the fighters of the besieged eastern neighborhoods of Aleppo and shelling and violent raids on the outskirts of the city |first= |last=user4 |publisher= |accessdate=6 August 2016 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20161005053229/http://www.syriahr.com/en/?p=49141 |archivedate=5 October 2016 }}{{cite web|url=https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/world/2016/08/06/syria-rebels-try-break-government-seige-aleppo/88336208/|title=Syria rebels try to break government siege in Aleppo|publisher=|accessdate=26 August 2016}} and announced the Army's siege of rebel-held east Aleppo had been broken.{{cite web|url=https://www.thenational.ae/world/syria-opposition-says-rebels-break-aleppo-regime-siege-1.149595|title=Syria opposition says rebels break Aleppo regime siege|publisher=|accessdate=6 August 2016}} However, the new rebel supply line was still under Army artillery fire and being hit by air-strikes, making both sides essentially under siege. Since the rebel offensive started, at least 130 civilians had been killed, most by rebel shelling of government-held districts. 500 fighters on both sides also died, mostly rebels.{{cite web|url=https://www.news24.com/World/News/at-least-500-fighters-killed-in-aleppo-in-7-days-20160806|title=At least 500 fighters killed in a week in Aleppo battle: monitor|publisher=News24|accessdate=3 October 2018}} At the end of the day, the rebels were in control of the entire Military Academy base and the Ramouseh district.[http://www.syriahr.com/en/?p=49158/ Factions incur regime, the Russians, the Iranians and the Lebanese Hezbollah the biggest spiritual and military loss since 2013] {{webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161005053225/http://www.syriahr.com/en/?p=49158%2F |date=5 October 2016 }} ===Fighting continues, Army retakes territory=== {{main article|Aleppo offensive (August–September 2016)}} On 7 August, fighting was still continuing in the Ramouseh district, where it was confirmed the Army was still in control of parts of the area.{{cite web|url=http://hosted2.ap.org/OHCOL/07e34bb59e064cedb7e2776e8db4b4f7/Article_2016-08-07-ML--Syria/id-6f8380a39f3643c884e2cc0075bce6a8|title=AP News - The Columbus Dispatch|publisher=|accessdate=26 August 2016}} The government, backed by Russia, launched an intensive air-strike campaign, in which one of the military schools captured by the rebels was reportedly leveled. Meanwhile, the rebels were putting up a "massive" defense to protect the new corridor.{{cite web|url=https://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2016/08/07/world/middleeast/ap-ml-syria.html|title=Syrian Rebels Breach Government-Imposed Siege on Aleppo|date=7 August 2016|work=AP|accessdate=26 August 2016|via=The New York Times}} The next day, the Ramouseh district was confirmed to be completely under rebel control,{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/understanding-battle-supply-lines-aleppo-city-map-update/|title=Understanding the battle for supply lines to Aleppo city – Map update|first=Chris|last=Tomson|date=8 August 2016|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|accessdate=8 August 2016}} while the Army recaptured al-Sanobrat hill.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/2016/08/09/%D8%B9%D8%B4%D8%B1%D8%A7%D8%AA-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%B6%D8%B1%D8%A8%D8%A7%D8%AA-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%AC%D9%88%D9%8A%D8%A9-%D8%AA%D8%B1%D8%A7%D9%81%D9%82-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%A7%D8%B4%D8%AA%D8%A8%D8%A7%D9%83%D8%A7/|title=عشرات الضربات الجوية ترافق الاشتباكات العنيفة في جنوب غرب مدينة حلب وشهداء وجرحى في قصف جوي على المدينة|publisher=}} On 11 August, the rebels attacked the government supply route to Aleppo between [[Khanasir]] and [[Ithriya]], capturing Mahmyat Al-Ghazal.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/jihadists-launch-offensive-obstruct-khanasser-supply-route/|title=Jihadists launch an offensive to obstruct Khanasser supply route|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=11 August 2016|publisher=al-Masdar|accessdate=12 August 2016}} However, the Army recaptured the village the following day.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-chases-jihadists-aleppo-supply-road-fringes/|title=Syrian Army chases Jihadists out of Aleppo supply road fringes|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=12 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=26 August 2016}} Between 11 and 17 August, the Army launched several counter-attacks, primarily against the 1070 Housing Project.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/jihadists-foil-first-syrian-army-offensive-southern-aleppo/|title=Jihadists foil first Syrian Army offensive in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=12 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=26 August 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-advances-southern-aleppo-amid-russian-airstrikes/|title=Syrian Army advances in southern Aleppo amid Russian airstrikes|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=13 August 2016|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|accessdate=14 August 2016}} During the fighting on 11 August 29 government and up to 20 rebel fighters were killed.{{cite web|url=http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!BREAKING-Rebels-Repel-HUGE-SAA-Attack-in-Aleppo/cjds/57ac563a0cf2460a62ee65b2|title=The Inside Source|publisher=|accessdate=26 August 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160830231409/http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!BREAKING-Rebels-Repel-HUGE-SAA-Attack-in-Aleppo/cjds/57ac563a0cf2460a62ee65b2|archive-date=30 August 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} By 17 August, government forces recaptured about 70 percent of the district.{{cite web|url=http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!SAA-Retreats-From-The-Technical-College/cjds/57b557c40cf25814fdca64f0|title=SAA Retreats From The Technical College!|publisher=|accessdate=26 August 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160830231409/http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!SAA-Retreats-From-The-Technical-College/cjds/57b557c40cf25814fdca64f0|archive-date=30 August 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} On 17 August, after capturing most of the 1070 Al-Hamdaniyah Housing Project, government forces also stormed the Air Force Technical Base. The former government commander of the base Brig. Gen. Deeb Bazi was killed as he led the assault. Back-and-forth fighting at the Academy continued into early September, when on 4 September, pro-government forces finally overwhelmed the rebel defenders and captured the whole complex.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-captures-strategic-military-base-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army captures strategic military base in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=4 September 2016|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|accessdate=4 September 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://in.reuters.com/article/mideast-crisis-syria-aleppo-idINKCN11A0QJ|title=Siege of eastern Aleppo resumes as Syrian government re-takes army site|first=Reuters|last=Editorial|publisher=|accessdate=9 September 2016}} Thus, government troops reestablished the siege of rebel-held areas of Aleppo.{{cite web|url=http://www.channelnewsasia.com/news/world/syria-army-besieges-aleppo-as-us-russia-talks-stumble/3100204.html|title=IS ousted from Turkey border as Syria army besieges Aleppo|publisher=|accessdate=9 September 2016}} Also during this time, on 21 August, government forces captured Umm Qara hill that overlooks the Khan Touman-Ramouseh Road near Al-Qarassi,{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/?p=49606|title=Continued clashes and advances for the regime in Aleppo|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!SAA-Counter-Attacks-in-South-Aleppo/cjds/57b9a3420cf2416a2e1cf879|title=The Inside Source|publisher=|accessdate=9 September 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160830231409/http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!SAA-Counter-Attacks-in-South-Aleppo/cjds/57b9a3420cf2416a2e1cf879|archive-date=30 August 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} as well as nearby SyriaTel hill.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-captures-syriatel-hill-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army captures SyriaTel Hill in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=21 August 2016|publisher=|accessdate=26 August 2016}} Multiple rebel counter-attacks in an attempt to recapture Umm Qara hill were eventually repelled.{{cite web|url=http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!Rebels-Suffer-Large-Defeat-in-Southern-Aleppo/cjds/57bd79600cf2f98c52991935|title=The Inside Source|publisher=|accessdate=26 August 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160830231409/http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!Rebels-Suffer-Large-Defeat-in-Southern-Aleppo/cjds/57bd79600cf2f98c52991935|archive-date=30 August 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} On 5 September, rebel frontlines in southern Aleppo collapsed, with pro-government forces overrunning three villages, three hills, two factories, two storage facilities, an Air Defense Base and a quarry.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-makes-huge-gains-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army makes huge gains in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=5 September 2016|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|accessdate=5 September 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!BREAKING-Rebel-Frontline-Collapses-in-South-Aleppo/cjds/57cd258c4c5873b76b3ef262|title=BREAKING! Rebel Frontline Collapses in South Aleppo!|date=5 September 2016|publisher=BREAKING! Rebel Frontline Collapses in South Aleppo!|accessdate=5 September 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160830231409/http://www.insidesourcenews.com/#!BREAKING-Rebel-Frontline-Collapses-in-South-Aleppo/cjds/57cd258c4c5873b76b3ef262|archive-date=30 August 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-continues-massive-advance-s-aleppo-amidst-jihadist-collapse/|title=Syrian Army continues massive advance in S. Aleppo amidst jihadist collapse|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=5 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=9 September 2016}} Between 6 and 8 September, the Syrian Army captured the whole Ramouseh district,{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-attacks-important-district-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army attacks important district in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=6 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=9 September 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-launches-massive-offensive-south-aleppo-district/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army launches massive offensive in south Aleppo district|first=Izat|last=Charkatli|date=7 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=9 September 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-captures-ramouseh-garages-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army captures the Ramouseh Garages in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=7 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=9 September 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-captures-several-sites-southern-aleppo-2/|title=Syrian Army captures several sites in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=8 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=9 September 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/2016/09/08/%D9%82%D9%88%D8%A7%D8%AA-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%86%D8%B8%D8%A7%D9%85-%D8%AA%D8%B3%D8%AA%D8%B9%D9%8A%D8%AF-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%B3%D9%8A%D8%B7%D8%B1%D8%A9-%D8%B9%D9%84%D9%89-%D8%AD%D9%8A-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%B1%D8%A7/|title=قوات النظام تستعيد السيطرة على حي الراموسة بعد أسابيع على خسارتها للمنطقة|publisher=}} reopening the Ramouseh Road to supply government-held western Aleppo by 9 September.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-opens-key-southern-aleppo-road/|title=Syrian Army opens key southern Aleppo road|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=9 September 2016|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|accessdate=9 September 2016}} On 10–11 September, the Syrian Army and its allies continued to advance in the 1070 Al-Hamdaniyah Housing Project and the Al-‘Amariyah District. They also continued to target the Hikmah School.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-advances-southern-aleppo-amid-jihadist-collapse/|title=Syrian Army advances in southern Aleppo amid jihadist collapse|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=10 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=22 September 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-captures-territory-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army captures more territory in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=10 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=22 September 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-launches-massive-assault-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army launches massive assault in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=11 September 2016|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|accessdate=11 September 2016}} On 11 September, airstrikes interrupted [[Eid al-Adha]] celebrations in rebel-held areas of Aleppo and [[Idlib]]. US and Russian officials negotiated a ceasefire hours prior, which was to go into effect later the following day at sundown.{{Cite news|url=http://www.aljazeera.com/news/2016/09/syria-scores-killed-air-strikes-truce-deal-160910135209691.html|title=Hopes fade for peaceful Eid in Syria as over 100 killed|last=|first=|date=|work=|access-date=12 September 2016|via=[[Al Jazeera]]}} ==Aftermath – Ceasefire and government assault on East Aleppo== {{main article|Aleppo offensive (September–October 2016)|Aleppo offensive (October–November 2016)|Aleppo offensive (November–December 2016)}} After the implementation of the ceasefire in mid-September, the Syrian Army withdrew its forces from the Castello road to allow UN humanitarian aid into the eastern parts of the city. However, rebel groups outside the city did not allow humanitarian aid convoys into Aleppo.{{cite web|url=https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/09/14/un-says-armed-syrian-groups-blocking-aid-to-aleppo-for-political/|title=UN says armed Syrian groups blocking Aleppo aid for 'political gain'|publisher=|accessdate=22 September 2016}} Later, as Russian Marines and Syrian Red Crescent personnel controlling Castello road came under fire by rebel groups, the SAA redeployed its soldiers once again.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-returns-strategic-aleppo-highway-rebel-attack/|title=Syrian Army returns to strategic Aleppo highway after rebel attack|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=16 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=22 September 2016}} On 16 September, the Russian Air Force carried out numerous airstrikes around Aleppo for the first time since the ceasefire had been reached four days earlier.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/russian-air-force-carries-first-airstrike-aleppo/|title=Russian Air Force carries out first airstrike in Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=16 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=22 September 2016}} On 19 September, an aid convoy from the [[United Nations]] and the [[Syrian Arab Red Crescent]] consisting of more than 18 trucks was reportedly hit by [[air-to-surface missile]]s as they headed for eastern Aleppo from the town of [[Urum al-Kubra]], killing 12 people and severely injuring several more.{{cite web|url=https://www.icrc.org/en/document/syria-attack-humanitarian-convoy-attack-humanity|title=Syria: Attack on humanitarian convoy is an attack on humanity|publisher=International Committee of the Red Cross|date=20 September 2016}} At the same time, Russia and Syria restarted heavy bombing raids on rebels in the city.{{cite web|url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-mideast-crisis-syria-idUSKCN11P146|title=Air strikes hit aid convoy as Syria says ceasefire over|work=Reuters|date=19 September 2016}} Early on 21 September, the Syrian Army seized most of Hikma Hill, thus being on the verge of recapturing Al-Hikma school and the 1070 Housing Project.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/jaysh-al-fatehs-defenses-crumble-syrian-army-swiftly-advances-southern-aleppo/|title=Jaysh Al-Fateh's defenses crumble as the Syrian Army swiftly advances in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=21 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=22 September 2016}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/?p=50903|title=Aerial bombardment on Khan Toman kills 13|publisher=}} However, later in the day, the rebels retook the positions they lost on the hill. Still, the Army managed to capture areas of the Ramouseh district that had been rebel-held since late 2012.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/jaysh-al-fateh-hangs-onto-hikmah-hill-despite-crumbling-defenses-southern-aleppo/|title=Jaysh Al-Fateh hangs onto Hikmah Hill despite crumbling defenses in southern Aleppo|first=Leith|last=Fadel|date=21 September 2016|publisher=|accessdate=22 September 2016}} Meanwhile, SOHR claimed that 3,000 Russian soldiers had arrived at Aleppo to support new government offensives in the area.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/?p=50896|title=3000 Russian soldiers arrived to Aleppo to support regime forces|publisher=SOHR|date=21 September 2016|accessdate=23 September 2016}} On 22 September, the Syrian Army launched a new offensive into the rebel-held eastern neighborhoods.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-begin-important-east-aleppo-offensive/|title=Syrian Army to begin important east Aleppo offensive|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|author=Leith Fadel|date=22 September 2016|accessdate=23 September 2016}} Government forces also made further progress in southern Aleppo, capturing a few sites.{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-hezbollah-storm-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army, Hezbollah storm southern Aleppo|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|author=Leith Fadel|date=22 September 2016|accessdate=23 September 2016}}{{cite web|url=https://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-continues-advance-south-aleppo-map-update/|title=Syrian Army continues advance in south Aleppo – Map update|publisher=[[Al-Masdar News]]|author=Izat Charkatli|date=22 September 2016|accessdate=23 September 2016}} A new rebel [[Aleppo offensive (October–November 2016)|attempt to break the siege]] starting in late October 2016, failed after two weeks of fighting, and consequently all major rebel positions in East Aleppo were overrun by pro-government and Kurdish forces by 13 December 2016. ==See also== * [[East Aleppo offensive (2015–16)]] * [[Northern Aleppo offensive (February 2016)]] * [[Northern Aleppo offensive (March–June 2016)]] * [[Aleppo offensive (September–October 2016)]] * [[Aleppo offensive (October–November 2016)]] * [[Aleppo offensive (November–December 2016)]] * [[2016 Khanasir offensive]] * [[2016 Southern Aleppo campaign]] * [[Western al-Bab offensive (2016)]] {{Portal|Syrian Civil War}} {{Clear}} ==References== {{Reflist|30em}} {{Syrian Civil War}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Aleppo summer campaign, 2016}} [[Category:Military operations of the Syrian Civil War in 2016]] [[Category:Aleppo in the Syrian Civil War]] [[Category:Aleppo Governorate in the Syrian Civil War]] [[Category:June 2016 events]] [[Category:July 2016 events]] [[Category:Military operations of the Syrian Civil War involving the al-Nusra Front]] [[Category:Military operations of the Syrian Civil War involving Jabhat Fateh al-Sham]] [[Category:Military operations of the Syrian Civil War involving the Syrian government]] [[Category:Military operations of the Syrian Civil War involving Hezbollah]] [[Category:Military operations of the Syrian Civil War involving Quds Force]] [[Category:Military operations of the Syrian Civil War involving Russia]] [[Category:Military operations of the Syrian Civil War involving the Syrian Democratic Forces]] [[Category:Military operations of the Syrian Civil War involving the People's Protection Units]] [[Category:June 2016 events in Asia]] [[Category:July 2016 events in Asia]] [[Category:August 2016 events in Asia]]
